name: m365-get-unifiedlog-spo-dlp-exchange-entra
title: Get Unified log for SharePoint DLP Exchange and Entra
shortDescription: Understand and track activities within your M365 environment is crucial for maintaining security and compliance.
longDescription: Audit Logs offer a wealth of information, and in this script focus on leveraging the Office 365 Management Activity API reference. It is a great alternative if you are only a SharePoint Administrator with no global admin or Purview Audit logs access.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
